fields.image_alt_text: Amigurumi Crochet Doll of Her Royal Highness and a Corgi
fields.store_description: LKM Creations, Handmade Amigurumi Crochet creations, with a sale on octopus toys mimic umbilical cords, creating a sense of calm that comforts preemie babies.
